entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, mentioned as 'he' and 'Harry'. He is walking with Mr. Weasley to the Underground station.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A wizard who is accompanying Harry to the Underground station. He has a wand in his jacket.

entities.name: sirius's mother
entities.description: Sirius's mother, mentioned as grunting in her sleep behind curtains.

entities.name: underground station
entities.description: A run-down and miserable little station where Harry and Mr. Weasley arrive to catch a non-magical transportation.

relationships.description: Harry is walking with Mr. Weasley to the Underground station, as mentioned in the text: 'He followed Mr. Weasley upstairs and along the hall.'
Harry arrives at the Underground station with Mr. Weasley, as mentioned in the text: 'when they arri ved at the miserable little Under-ground station'.
Mr. Weasley also arrives at the Underground station with Harry, as mentioned in the text: 'when they arri ved at the miserable little Under-ground station'.
